name: places/ChIJBUfmt4L2wokRc8D2VetBtW0
formattedAddress: 517 W 164th St, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 517 W 164th St, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text:
I can't say enough about the WHIN school. This environment encourages learning in all forms; it's a great place for kids who learn in all different ways, not just traditional lecture style. WHIN is a rare gem and unlike any other place I looked at.

This was the best decision I ever made for my kids. My son's two kindergarten teachers saved his life. He was so unhappy before and struggling in PreK at a different school, but now he is learning to read, write, and concentrate for longer amounts of time. Most of all, he loves his teachers and peers and he's happy because at WHIN school is FUN!

I won't send any of my children to any school other than WHIN as long as I have the option. If you are thinking about WHIN, send your child here and you won't be disappointed!

originalText.text: Best school ever. I like WHIN by some reason and first how school organised study process during COVID 19 - understandable, give possible support as for students so for parents, communication was excellent, as parent I know what to do and know what I can expect. Teachers are awesome, knowledgeable, principal know every student by name.
